entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 27.
